com.netflix.hystrix

Interface HystrixInvokable<R>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HystrixExecutable<R>, HystrixObservable<R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HystrixCollapser, HystrixCommand, HystrixObservableCollapser, HystrixObservableCommand

    public interface HystrixInvokable<R>
    Marker interface for Hystrix commands that can be invoked.
